name: Conditional Attach Element From Party
effects: Grants [Attach Fire]/[Attach Ice]/[Attach Lightning]/[Attach Earth]/[Attach Wind]/[Attach Water]/[Attach Holy]/[Attach Dark]/[Attach Poison] if current number of combined Attach Element statuses on party members are a majority Attach Fire/Ice/Lightning/Earth/Wind/Water/Holy/Dark/Poison. In the case of ties the prior listed order is used to determine status granted
notes: Placeholder status for database purposes, in-game the logic of what to grant isn't controlled through a status but through a if/else set of sub conditions

name: Conditional Attach Element with Stacking
effects: Grants [Attach Fire with Stacking]/[Attach Ice with Stacking]/[Attach Lightning with Stacking]/[Attach Earth with Stacking]/[Attach Wind with Stacking]/[Attach Water with Stacking]/[Attach Holy with Stacking]/[Attach Dark with Stacking]/[Attach Poison with Stacking] if the user has [Attach Fire]/[Attach Ice]/[Attach Lightning]/[Attach Earth]/[Attach Wind]/[Attach Water]/[Attach Holy]/[Attach Dark]/[Attach Poison]
notes: Placeholder status for database purposes, in-game the logic of what to grant isn't controlled through a status but through a if/else set of sub conditions
